Text:
Thank you mirrormaster82 !!
Maybe you can help me. I 'am looking for "The Marquis" since a long time. It is an independent comic book series written and illustrated by Guy Davis, released by Oni Press and Dark Horse Comics :
    INFERNO (336 pages, Dark Horse, August 2009):
        DANCE MACABRE(collects Dance Macabre, 5-issue limited series and issue #0, 1997 and 2000, 176 pages, 2001, Oni Press)
        INTERMEZZO (112 pages, 2003, Oni Press) collects:
            "Hell's Courtesan" (2-issue mini-series, 2002)
            "A Sin of One" (one-shot, 2003)

 I would be very happy if you can help me !! : )

annawonder:Heh,I know :) Anyway thanks for kind words.
PiratusLongus:Most of Marquis isn't scanned so it's difficult to find,I'll see when I have more time if I can come up with something.
